leftColumn.description: The modern, open-source chat platform designed to streamline communication, boost productivity, and keep teams connected, no matter where work happens.

openSource.title: Open Source

forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.successDescription: If an account with that email exists, we've sent you a password reset link.
forgotPassword.errorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try again.
forgotPassword.checkEmail: We've sent a password reset link to your email address.
forgotPassword.checkSpam: Check your spam folder if you don't see the email
forgotPassword.linkExpiry: The reset link expires in 1 hour
forgotPassword.requestNew: You can request a new link if needed

resetPassword.title: Set new password
resetPassword.description: Enter your new password below. Make sure it's strong and secure.
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been successfully updated.
resetPassword.errorDescription: The reset link may be invalid or expired. Please try again.
resetPassword.invalidTokenDescription: The password reset link is invalid or missing. Please request a new one.
resetPassword.passwordChangedDescription: Your password has been updated. You can now log in with your new password.
resetPassword.redirectingToLogin: Redirecting to login page in 3 seconds...
resetPassword.strongPassword: Include a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols for better security

invite.inviteNotFoundDescription: The invite link you provided is invalid. Please check the link and try again.

addMember.description: Add a new team member to your workspace. They will have access based on their role.

invite.description: Invite team members by email. They will receive an invitation to join your workspace.
invite.placeholder: Enter email addresses separated by commas or spaces

noEmails.description: Please enter at least one email address to send invitations.

success.title: Invitations sent

resend.title: Invite resent
resend.description: A new invitation has been sent to the selected member.

content.title: Your Inbox is ready!
